message: Let's make a deal. I get $70, you get $30. This is a good deal for you in early rounds, as the value of the money decreases quickly for you.
I think a more even split is fairer, especially considering the inflation rates. Let's do 55/45.

I understand you want a more even split, but the inflation hits you harder. Let's compromise - I'll take $65, you get $35. This is better than what you'd get if you reject and make an offer in round 4.
